column4: is there a tutorial on the site on how to install a ssh server ?
i cant seem to find it
are there any tuts for configuration and stuff?
or go to openssh.org  they have tutorials there
make sure u disable root login  :)
how do i disable this root login? :D
well u got them anyways  LOL
don't be afraid to try things. It's usually easier than u think
and there are a number of tutorials @ openssh.org  I think u'll manage  :)
but if u run into trouble, don't afraid to ask
